nodes.bodyText: Why are these dates important? This comment is just stating the same thing as the code - the comment should instead address what the code cannot, which is why 9/12 and 11/12 are the dates.
These dates are the nightly servers on the day the server was released (looking into builds dir). I will add a comment to that effect.
Same thing - why do we require 9.0-11 and not 9.0-10?
@kkanthet mentioned in the ticket that the support for 5.3.0 starts from 9.0-11. I am not sure of the specific reason why 9.0-10 is not supported.
Please try to find the reason for it - this is likely the best place to have some documentation, since it's the code that's enforcing the requirement.
